page.title: 18MUSIC IN BIDEFORD
page.content: THE MOST POPULAR MUSIC IS POP MUSIC WITH MOST{TEENAGERS}THEY PLAY ALLSORTS OF POP MUSIC IN THE STREET. I LIKE POP MUSIC AND I AM TEN. THERE IS A LOT OF SOFT, SWEET MUSIC TOO. WHICH DO YOU PREFER? IN OUR SCHOOL WE HAVE A SCHOOL ORCHESTRA I PLAY A TRUMPET. WE HAVE A BAND WHICH IS KNOWN AS{BIDEFORD BAND. THEY HAVE WON LOTS OF CHAMPIONSHIPS. WE GET A LOT OF{COUNTRY AND WESTERN}IN THE PUBS. IN THE COMMUNTIY CENTRE THERE ARE{DISCOS,}WHICH IS{POP MUSIC AGAIN. WE HAVE LOTS OF PEOPLE SINGING IN THE STREETS.
